sentences.english: So disproving it's her pancreas proves it's her brain?
sentences.chinese: 所以排除了胰腺问题等于证明了大脑问题？

sentences.english: And 10 cases of normal pancreases tissues.
sentences.chinese: 选取正常胰腺组织10例为对照。

sentences.english: The shrimp hepatopancreas consists of a lot of epithelial tubules which are symmetrical.
sentences.chinese: 肝胰腺由两侧对称的分枝上皮小管组成。

sentences.english: Expression of JAM-C in different tissues of mice with acute necrotizing pancreatitis.
sentences.chinese: 在小鼠急性坏死性胰腺炎模型不同组织中的表达。

sentences.english: Mr. Swayze's cancer was diagnosed in January 2008.
sentences.chinese: 斯威兹于2008年1月被诊断出患有胰腺癌。

sentences.english: Objective To examine the penetration rates of 7 antibiotics into the liver and pancreatic tissues.
sentences.chinese: 肝胆系统和胰腺感染是腹部外科的常见病。

sentences.english: It can lead to inflammation of the pancreas, which increases your risk of diabetes.
sentences.chinese: 它能导致胰腺炎，能增加你患糖尿病的危险。

sentences.english: Conclusions Ulinastatin has a better effect on mild acute pancreatitis.
sentences.chinese: 结论乌司他丁对急性轻症胰腺炎有较好的疗效。

sentences.english: Conclusions:Selective iNOS inhibitor-aminoguanidine has protective effect on the transplanted pancreas in rats.
sentences.chinese: 选择性抑制剂氨基胍在大鼠胰腺移植中起到保护作用。

sentences.english: Sweet potatoes look like the pancreas and actually balance the glycemic index of diabetics.
sentences.chinese: 地瓜形状像胰腺，可以调节糖尿病患者的血糖指数。

sentences.english: Aim To observe and compare the efficacy of ulinastatin(UTI) and gabexate mesilate(GM) on treating acute pancreatitis.
sentences.chinese: 目的对比乌司他丁和加贝酯对急性胰腺炎的疗效。

sentences.english: Postoperative histopathological examination confirmed 18 cases of gastric ectopic pancreas, and 2 cases of lipomas.
sentences.chinese: 病理组织学检查后确诊异位胰腺18例，脂肪瘤2例。

sentences.english: Objective To summarize the recent pathogenetic researches on the acute pancreatitis.
sentences.chinese: 目的总结急性胰腺炎发病机理的研究进展。

sentences.english: Human pancreatic ribonuclease has 128 amino acid residues.
sentences.chinese: 人的胰腺核糖核酸酶有128个氨基酸残基。

sentences.english: How Does Ellagic Acid Exert An Anti-Cancer Effect On Pancreatic Cancer Cells?
sentences.chinese: 鞣花酸是怎样发挥抗胰腺癌作用的？

sentences.english: The embryologic pancreas arises from 2 buds in the foregut.
sentences.chinese: 胰腺胚胎学起源于前肠的2个芽。
